title: 8seats
description: The easiest, smartest messaging app for small- med business. No IT skills required. Add AI team members to work *together* with your team. Dynamic chat in *8seats Tables* allows one click access to ALL conversations. Supports 10,000 people in rooms and up to 20 in tables. Secure, encrypted, and up to 4x faster to use than other chat apps. FREE and low cost PRO options available.
